fields.name: Finish_Screen
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for your request, {!$User.FirstName}! The request has been created and we are coming back to you as soon as possible!


While we are handling your request, you can take a look at the user manual, maybe you find something helpful that might solve your issue.


Click here to get back to Salesforce

fields.name: Copy_2_of_Finish_Screen
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for your feedback, {!$User.FirstName}!


The request was created and we are coming back to you as soon as possible!


Click here to get back to Salesforce

fields.name: Copy_3_of_InputBug
fields.fieldText:
Bug / Problem


Hi there {!$User.FirstName}, we are sorry that you experience problems in the system, but we are here to fix them.


Please fill in the following fields so we can categorize and assign the ticket to the right person.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_FieldBU
fields.fieldText: Which Business Unit do you belong to?

fields.name: Copy_1_of_BugObject
fields.fieldText: On which object does the problem appear?

fields.name: BugDescription
fields.helpText: Please provide the steps how the problem occurred.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_ScreenshotInfo
fields.fieldText: On the next page you can submit a screenshot of the error message or the any other relevant screenshots..

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_InputFields
fields.fieldText:
Request for new user


Please give information about the user that should be deactivated and who should take over the records.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_InputBug
fields.fieldText:
Help & Guidance


Hi {!$User.FirstName}! Please fill in the following fields and describe your need of assistance in the system.


﻿We will come back to with input as soon as possible.

fields.name: TextBUPerformance
fields.fieldText: Which Business Unit do you belong to?

fields.name: TextObjectPerformance
fields.fieldText: On which object does the problem appear?

fields.name: PerformanceDescription
fields.helpText: Please provide the steps how the problem occurred.

fields.name: Screenshot_Info_Performance
fields.fieldText: On the next page you can submit a screenshot of the error message or the any other relevant screenshots..

fields.name: Copy_2_of_InputBug
fields.fieldText:
Improvement / Change request


Hi there {!$User.FirstName}, we are very happy that you want to help making the system better for you and your fellow colleagues.


Please fill in the following fields so we can categorize your input and assign the ticket to the right person.

fields.name: FieldBUImprovement
fields.fieldText: Which Business Unit do you belong to?

fields.name: TextImprovementObject
fields.fieldText: Where in Salesforce can we improve ourselves?

fields.name: ImprovementDescription
fields.helpText: Describe your wish on how to improve the system

fields.name: Copy_2_of_ScreenshotInfo
fields.fieldText: On the next page you can submit screenshots..

fields.name: Copy_1_of_InputFields
fields.fieldText:
Request for new user


Please give information about the user that should be deactivated and who should take over the records.

fields.name: InputFields
fields.fieldText:
Request for new user


Please give information about the user that should be created.

fields.name: Copy_2_of_Copy_1_of_Finish_Screen
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for your request, {!$User.FirstName}! The request has been created and we are working on the request.



Click here to get back to Salesforce

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Finish_Screen
fields.fieldText:
You do not have the permission to request a new user license. Please contact your Super User for requesting a user license.


Click here to get back to Salesforce

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Finish_Screen
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for your request, {!$User.FirstName}! The request has been created and we are creating the user as soon as possible.



Click here to get back to Salesforce

fields.name: WhatRequest
fields.fieldText:
User Support - New Request


Thank you for reaching out, we are here to support you!

fields.name: Type_Choice
fields.fieldText: Please choose from the following topics

textTemplates.name: EmailNotificationBug
textTemplates.text:
We have a new User Support request - type bug.

Subject: {!Subject_Bug}

BU: {!BusinessUnitBug}

Description: {!BugDescription}

Link to the Bug

textTemplates.name: EmailNotificationContract
textTemplates.text:
We have a new User Support Case for "Contract"

Click link to open

textTemplates.name: EmailNotificationHelpGuidance
EmailNotificationImprovement
EmailNotificationUserActivationDeactivation
textTemplates.text: We have a new User Support Case for "User Activation / Deactivation"
